TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program update 1.4 Grand Discussion thread.

Articles.Content: There already is a master discussion thread for this version, @DES7R0Y3R, and your thread has been merged into it.
Apologies, I didn't realise. I can take it down if you'd rather. I'll try and be more observant.

5 hours ago, DES7R0Y3R said:

Apologies, I didn't realise. I can take it down if you'd rather. I'll try and be more observant.

 

No need to apologize. And the "merge" I did means your posts are already part of this thread, but thanks for offering to remove them.

Ive played alittle bit with the advanced difficult settings,and must say

Plasma blackout,requires signal to control and the g-force limit for kerbals and part are genieous(and the concisness loss insted of dead)also the slider for reentry heat is cool some kind of stock DRE*    YEAH!

 ,realy well done and THANKS @SQUAD

with this i think u got realy nice IDEAS in your backpockets ,and ive been excited with what u in future  come up with

Edited April 26, 2018 by Burning Kan
inspiration for future

I haven't played 1.4 much, but I loaded it up today and within 20 minutes found a bug with a contract.

All I had to do was haul a Hammer RT-10 SRB up to an altitude of between 38,000 and 43,000 meters, with a speed between 340 and 520 m/s.  I absolutely nailed the conditions required, but the contract would not complete.  I reverted the flight and tried again, but no luck this time either.

So it's back to 1.2 for me and hopefully Squad will be able to sort these bugs out soon.

I have a question:

I play on 1.3.0 with many mods inclusive Outer Planets Mod, what do you think about starting second KSP with Version 1.4.x and is the Making Hystory Expansion Pack worth (i need to buy it).

And whats about all these negative comments on Steam that KSP 1.4 is spyware?

23 minutes ago, SwissSpace93 said:

I have a question:

I play on 1.3.0 with many mods inclusive Outer Planets Mod, what do you think about starting second KSP with Version 1.4.x and is the Making Hystory Expansion Pack worth (i need to buy it).

And whats about all these negative comments on Steam that KSP 1.4 is spyware?

1.4.3 is , IMHO, much more stable than 1.3.0

Regarding the other question,  it's been well proven that it is not spyware.

1 hour ago, SwissSpace93 said:

And whats about all these negative comments on Steam that KSP 1.4 is spyware?

 

There is analytics software running in the game, which you are not given the legally mandated (EU) option to opt out from.  People are blowing it a bit out of proportion, but Squad and Take-Two's head-in-the-sand approach of pretending there is no problem seems to be winning them no friends.

15 hours ago, klesh said:

 

There is analytics software running in the game, which you are not given the legally mandated (EU) option to opt out from.  People are blowing it a bit out of proportion, but Squad and Take-Two's head-in-the-sand approach of pretending there is no problem seems to be winning them no friends.

Ok good to know, i got the 1.4.3 and Mission Builder Expansion Pack. 

It looks nice when i finished my Dres Mission in 1.3.0 i‘m going to do some Missions in 1.4.3

I landed on the Mun and the landing legs started bouncing the ship up and down.  It hadn't stopped ten minutes later, but I was able to go to the menu at the peak of one of the bounces when the velocity was evening out and GTFO.
dont know if its just me, or if its already been discussed but the alt-f12 menu is not opening?
Seems to be just you? Works fine for me.

It works for me @53miner53.

Hey, that rhymes!
figured out my problem, nvidia's in game overlay uses alt-f12 to toggle fps display in your recording....keeps ksp from using alt-f12 to open the debug menu
Pretty good update I do say
